Enes KÃ¶seler (born 22 April 1996) is a Turkish entrepreneur and communication professional. He works in the fields of public relations, media production, urban transformation, and marketing. KÃ¶seler is known as the founder of Pyravis Media Production Academy Ltd., a company active in media education and PR services.
